Naiqian Zheng (郑乃千)

GitHub / LinkedIn

About me

I am an undergraduate in school of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science in Peking University (2018-) and a former participant of Physics Olympiad (2015-2018).

I am currently advised by Prof. Tong Yang and my research interests are Data Center Networking, Cloud Computing and Dataplane Programmability.
